channel.title: Bat for Lashes on mattischrome
channel.description: Recent content in Bat for Lashes on mattischrome

item.title: Album Digest, July 2016
item.description: Album Digest July 2016 consists of a bumper five albums, mainly because I couldn’t work out which one to drop. I think they’re all pretty good though it’s great to hear new music from The Avalanches after all this time.

item.title: Album Digest, November 2012
item.description: Pretty much a sliding scale between songs and electronic wibble on this monthâ€™s albums and a particularly damp, chilly feeling to proceedings too.
